sentences.en: I hesitated, weighing and balancing the imponderable realities.
sentences.cn: 我犹豫, 仔细考虑并权衡着这种无法衡量的关系.

sentences.en: In his scheme, investment was governed by the animal spirits of entrepreneurs, facing an imponderable future.
sentences.cn: 在他的设计中, 投资由企业家的“动物本能”驱动,其前途充满了不确定性.

sentences.en: Our imponderable resources in knowledge are constantly growing and are inexhaustible.
sentences.cn: 我们无法估量的知识资源是不断发展永不枯竭的.

sentences.en: Our resources in technical knowledge are imponderable.
sentences.cn: 我们的技术知识资源是无法估量的.

sentences.en: The effect of his new method is imponderable.
sentences.cn: 他的新方法所起的作用是无法正确估计的.

sentences.en: There can never be a definitive version of a myth, because it refers to the more imponderable aspects of life.
sentences.cn: 一个神话永远不可能有一个最终版本，因为它涉及到生命中更加无法估量的各个方面。
